room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We have done two rooms both were great! We did Kidnapping with 3 of us and Hostage with 2. Esvaped both times but definitely needed help. A good time!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: First time visitor. Tried the kidnap room. We had an awesome time. We will definitely be back to try other rooms. Anyone who has been thinking about trying it, you definitely need to. Such a great time.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We did the Kidnap room today and had a great time! Paul was the perfect game master. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Such a fun time. Came to town from Chicago for a haunted house convention and it was well worth the 30min drive. My group got out of the Kidnapping room with only 6:30 to spare. Mason gave some good clues without giving anything away!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We did two rooms tonight: Museum Heist and The Kidnapping. This was our first trip to Breakout Games but these were our 10th and 11th escape rooms overall. These were challenging, interesting rooms! There were loads of puzzles/locks we've never seen before. High quality, solvable puzzles. The two Game Masters we had, Logan & Julie, were incredibly awesome. Everything is clean, well thought out and we will definitely be back to do the other two rooms! Couldn't recommend it more.
